text:
Hi Ops,

I'm trying to debug some issues with `deploy-to-cluster` that we're seeing with `rop-status` deployments. When deploying our `status-primary` Helm chart, as far as I can tell, all our deployments and jobs run successfully, but `deploy-to-cluster` still reports a failure. I assumed yesterday that this was due to the Harbor issues around replication/network speed we were seeing, but this now appears to be resolved and the same issue still presents.

Trying to investigate, I can login to Spinnaker but appear to have lost the permissions I had so I can't view the pipeline execution to see what Spinnaker is unhappy about, hence hopping on here for advice.

*Failed `deploy-to-cluster`:* <https://sc-jenkins.rtplab.nimblestorage.com/job/Storage-Central-Deployments/job/deploy-to-cluster/27847/console>
*Spinnaker pipeline execution:* <https://spinnaker-qa.qa.cds.hpe.com/#/applications/storage-central-common/executions/01GYCEDW6EY2V1Q6D1289CA8FE>

> Istio proxy logs shows a lot of connection errors:
> ```upstream_reset_before_response_started{connection_failure,delayed_connect_error:_111}```
> This is in both SFMPOC and SCDEV clusters (although SFMPOC is under higher load and so it's more frequent there).

This is really hurting us, please advise

Hi <!subteam^S04A260JKJ8|@dscc-devops-ems> , we are planning to update the "apiversion" field in yaml files from v1beta1 => v1 to avoid getting the deprecation warnings as mentioned in <https://confluence.eng.nimblestorage.com/display/CDSDEVOPS/Deprecation+Scanning+Reports+per+Cluster>
Since changing the apiversion is a breaking change from the kubernetes perspective, this would result in down time.
Was wondering if there is any recommendations/suggestion how to take this change to POC and higher clusters ?
Should we fix these deprecation warnings now or we could do that later after EKS upgrade ?

This issue has been resolved.

The workaround was to hard-code the proxy IP to a known-good host that correctly handles requests to Spinnaker's API port.

The DNS name for the proxy used for the pipelines routed requests to a proxy that is known to be broken.  A ticket is being worked with ZScalar to fix the proxy that is not handling requests to the Spinnaker API port.
